DOC.brief_title: LiveWell : A Mobile Intervention Bipolar Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: A single blind , randomize control trial ( N = 200 , 2:3 ratio usual care v usual care intervention ) conduct clinical practice around Chicago Minneapolis . Eligible participant adult bipolar 1 disorder patient experience current mood episode history least one acute episode last two year treatment psychiatrist . The primary clinical outcome time relapse , secondary outcome percent time symptomatic , symptom severity , quality life . Participation study last 12 month . Participants ask carry smartphone whenever leave home wear wristwatch measure activity day every day . Participants also ask complete series telephone assessment may ask complete daily check-in smartphone work health coach . Participants need attend two in-person clinic visit 680 N Lake Shore Drive , Chicago IL 60611 Suite 1520 3311 E Old Shakopee Rd , Bloomington , MN 55425 .
